HEADLINE: In continuation of our letter dated October 14, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the audio / video recording and transcript of the presentation made on October 21, 2022, on Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2022, is available on the Company's website at https://www.ril.com/InvestorRelations/FinancialReporting.aspx. ....
